title: Voting Eligibility Checker
description:
Complete the program to check voting eligibility.

The variable 'age' is already created with value 20.

Write an if/else statement that:
- Prints 'Can vote' if age >= 18
- Prints 'Cannot vote' otherwise

Since age is 20, it should print: Can vote
